hero.title: Managed IT, ERP/CRM, and Cloud solutions for modern businesses
hero.subtitle: We design, implement, and operate open‑source and enterprise platforms — secure, scalable, and cost‑effective.
why.title: Why ViTech Cloud?
why.item1.d: Lower downtime via 24/7 monitoring and maintenance.
why.item2.d: Hardening, patching, backups and incident workflows.
why.item3.d: Clear SLAs, reports, and predictable monthly pricing.
home.t1: “Rock-solid Nextcloud + helpdesk operations — support is fast and professional.”
home.t2: “ERP rollout improved stock control and sped up invoicing.”
home.t3: “Cloud migration cut our costs by 22% with no security trade‑offs.”
services.title: Services
solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.intro: Blueprints and packages that accelerate your transformation.
solutions.erp: ERP for SMB — finance, inventory, purchasing, production, reporting.
solutions.crm: CRM with 360° customer view, campaigns, pipelines, email linking.
solutions.msp: Helpdesk, ticketing, directory, backup and endpoint protection.
solutions.devops: DevOps: Git, CI/CD and container operations.
solutions.security: Security baseline: MFA, firewalling, vulnerability scanning.

cases.c2.d: Implementation and integration: −35% order‑to‑invoice lead time.
cases.c3.d: Zammad + SLAs + reports: 96% tickets resolved on time.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Monitoring, patching, backups, security, helpdesk and documentation under an SLA.
faq.q2: Run in our cloud or yours?
faq.a2: Both are possible. We deploy in your environment or as a fully managed service.
faq.a3: Yes — pick a starter package and scale up without disruption.
faq.a4: Both open‑source and enterprise options. We recommend after a needs assessment.

about.title: About ViTech Cloud
about.body: ViTech Cloud is a Swedish partner for modern IT. We combine open platforms with proven methods in operations, security and cloud.
contact.title: Contact us
contact.body: Send a message and we’ll get back to you. Include your current systems if possible.
